plot: Frank is working away in his clock shop,but can't shake the feeling that someone is keeping time with his wife, Helen. Little things arouse suspicion and keep creeping into his conscience. ...
title: Four O'Clock
plot_es: Frank is working away in his clock shop,but can't shake the feeling that someone is keeping time with his wife, Helen. Little things arouse suspicion and keep creeping into his conscience. ...
